## Setup:

```{r}
# load in packages
library(ggplot2)
library(tibble)
```

```{r}
# inspect mpg data
mpg
```

```{r}
mpg %>% # call our data and pipe it into ggplot
  ggplot(aes(displ, cty, colour = class)) + # 
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
mpg %>% 
  ggplot(aes(displ, cty, colour = class, size = cyl, shape = trans)) + 
  geom_point(show.legend = FALSE) + 
  theme_void() + 
  scale_color_brewer()
```

```{r}
mpg |>
  ggplot(aes(displ, hwy, colour = class)) + 
  geom_jitter(show.legend = FALSE, size = 3, width = 0, height = 1000) + 
  geom_line(show.legend = FALSE)+
  geom_jitter(show.legend = FALSE, size = 0.2, colour = "#222222", width = 0) + 
  coord_polar() + 
  theme_void() + 
  scale_color_brewer()
```
